::Prowl::

Prowl felt Iron Raptor whimpering and squeezing against him before he 
landed. He was once again filled with excitement as they plummeted 
down toward the ground, missing Iron Raptor's thoughts in the 
proccess. He loved flying! Alot of his life was spent on his wings, 
it was when he was most alive.

He smiles as he lands, expecting a joke or something from her. THe 
smile is whiped off his face as Iron Raptor's palm hits the side of 
his face, his head recoiling one way and then the other as she 
follows up with a hit from the other side. The Maximal blinks in 
surprise, looking down as Iron Raptor falls.

He couldn't help but chuckle as he sees her cape fall on her head, 
thinking that she looked very pretty collapsed on the ground with her 
cape covering most of her face. He tries to feel sorry for scaring 
her half to death, but that had really been the coolest flight he had 
ever had.

-I'm sorry, love,- he replies, kneeling down in front of her, -But I 
couldn't resist testing out these new abilities.-

He looks at her, trying to make his eyes look like puppy eyes. -
Forgive me?-





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> * It was a little cold at the hight that they were, and with the 
wind 
> whipping her cape behind her, it wasn't exactly warm. But at least 
her fromt 
> was saved from the cold, but only because it was against Prowl.
> But her fear kept her from caring that she was chilling in the 
armor, 
> keeping her eyes closed and her body well plastered to Prowls.
> She heard his thought, and knew that this was coming from a man she 
could 
> swear was born with wings...or at least a flying guide.
> 
> Iron Raptor whimpers again as she opens one eye, her cheek against 
Prowl's 
> chest. Looking down as they happened to weev away from a 
particularly sharp 
> looking mountain peek. Whimpering a third time as she squeezed her 
eyes shut 
> and clung harder.
> She didn't know it at the time, but she had been clinging so hard 
to Prowl 
> the mechanical tendens in her hands had been standing out.
> Her jaw clenched shut.
> But then, just as she thought her spark might fail from beating so 
hard, she 
> suddenly noticed something...she could hear the flapping of her 
cape.
> She could't before, mainly because it was plastered against her 
even more 
> then she was to Prowl before.
> Iron Raptor opened her eyes and looked sown, feeling a softer 
current of air 
> flow against her and watching her cape flitter in the find.
> They were still very high...but at least she didn't really have the 
worry of 
> being plastered to the side of a mountain.
> She relaxed her grip...slightly. Sighing in relief.*
> 
> < Thank youuuuuaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhh!!>
> 
> * This was her reply right when Prowl cut his boosters, Iron 
Raptors eyes 
> going wide and her grip resuming as they seemed to hang in mid-air 
for a 
> moment.*
> 
> *gasp!*
> 
> * And with that they began to fall, just as her mind trailed off in 
her 
> thanking Prowl, secretly cursing him as they plumited towards the 
forests 
> below.
> Her eyes squeezed shut and her teeth gritting, clinging on for dear 
life. 
> The white hot light of fear coming into her head once again.
> Slag! She hated this!
> Iron Raptor remained in this position, even as Prowl reactivated 
his 
> boosters and stabalized himself on the ground. Landing.
> With a sigh, letting the breath she had been holding, out, Iron 
Raptor 
> opened her eyes...finally realizing that they were surrounded by 
trees and 
> on the ground.
> 
> She let go of Prowl a little, keeping a hand on him to make sure 
that she 
> could still stand. Her legs felt like jell-o!
> Iron Raptor then turned and looked at Prowl with a scowl on her 
face, the 
> rest of her helm retracting to let her hair fall down her shoulders.
> Prowl had known that she had been scared, but he had pulled that 
last trick 
> none the less.
> Iron Raptor raised a quick hand and brought the flat palm down 
against Prowl 
> cheek, hard! Then she swung her hand up and hit the other cheek 
with the 
> back of it.
> Her had just been bitch slapped.
> Her knees suddenly giving out under her right after, maing her end 
up cross 
> leged on the ground where she had stood, sitting on her rear. She 
had known 
> she was going to collaps...she just wanted to give Prowl a piece of 
her 
> mind...that he couldn't listen to with his own, before she did fall.
> But now she was saticfide, sitting there and shaking visably, her 
mind 
> clearer now thought...the hits making them so.
> The cape seemed to ruffle down from her height moments before, 
floting down 
> and nestling itself right on top of her head, some down her 
back...mose 
> covering her face.
> From under the red fabrik there was a sigh, partly of annoyance and 
relief.
> One thought in mind, directed right towards Prowl.*
> 
> < Jerk....>

> * Iris only grumbles, just as an old woman might as she looks onto 
a bunch 
> of children roughhousing. Remembering the good old days.
> But Iris was far from old. She was just as young as Iron Raptor, 
because she 
> was a part of her programming, but much more mature. In body and 
mind.
> Iris humphs.*
> 
> " I've seen data process faster then that!"
> 
> * But she crosses her arms as Firearm transforms and drives up to 
her, 
> looking him over before looking at him sternly.
> Though, she didn't mean to wreck his jolly attitude.
> Iris easily jumped on but then looked down at the armor plating of 
his 
> mode.*
> 
> " Just try it, sunny, and only ONE of us will make it back to base 
in one
